title: Reaching out: Ken Tyler - master printer
creator_credit: Lee Tirce, Sid Avery, Avery and Tirce Productions
brief_description: Highlights the relationship between the printer and artist by focusing on Ken Tyler who has worked with many significant artists including Roy Lichtenstein, David Hockney, and Robert Rauschenberg. He has influenced these artists in refining and enlarging upon the boundaries of the printmaking art. Suitable for upper secondary level.
